navigation.title: Subtitle Editor
navigation.github: Open-source on GitHub with MIT License

controls.jumpBack: Jump back {seconds, plural, =1 {# second} other {# seconds}}
controls.jumpForward: Jump forward {seconds, plural, =1 {# second} other {# seconds}}

videoPlayer.supportedFormatsNote:
Playback depends on the codecs built into your browser.
Chrome, Edge, and Firefox handle Ogg/WebM/Opus audio (for example .oga, .opus, .weba) and Speex.
Safari on macOS/iOS does not support those containers yet.

findReplace.title: Find / Replace
findReplace.scopeNote: Only searches within the current subtitle track.

bulkOffset.title: Select subtitles to bulk offset timestamps of current track: {track}
bulkOffset.emptyState: Load subtitles to enable bulk offsets.

instructions.afterLoading: After loading the subtitles and media file:
instructions.editText: Click the subtitle text or timestamps to edit your captions.
instructions.icons: Click the icons to add, merge or delete subtitles.
instructions.dragBorders: Drag the dashed borders on the waveform to change the subtitles' time stamps.
instructions.rememberSave: Remember to click "Save" to download as .srt / .vtt / .txt / .csv when you finish editing!

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.tab: to edit the current subtitle text.
shortcuts.arrowsAction: to jump to the previous/next subtitle.
shortcuts.splitSubtitle: to split the subtitle text at the cursor position when editing it.
shortcuts.mergeSubtitle: to merge the current subtitle with the previous one.
shortcuts.switchTrack: to switch subtitle tracks if you have multiple tracks.

dialog.discardDescription: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them by loading a new subtitle file?
dialog.switchDescription: Changing the language will discard the current subtitles. Make sure you have downloaded the current subtitles first.
dialog.srtDescription: You can add 4 tracks at most. You can rename the tracks.
dialog.saveDescription: Choose a track to download as .srt, .vtt, .txt, or .csv format.
dialog.deleteTrackDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the track and all its subtitles.
dialog.showTrackLabels: Show track labels in the waveform visualizer

validation.invalidStartDescription: Start time cannot be later than the end time of the subtitle.
validation.invalidEndDescription: End time cannot be earlier than the start time of the subtitle.

metadata.title: Subtitle Editor - Permanently Free, Open-source, Fully Web-based SRT/VTT Editing Tool
metadata.description: Edit, create, and align SRT/VTT subtitle and captions files easily with this free, open-source, web-based editor. Features video preview and waveform visualization. No signup required.

waveform.instructions: Waveform view focused. Press Space to play or pause, and use the Left and Right arrow keys to move by one second.
waveform.regionAnnouncement: Selected subtitle from {start} to {end} on track {track}.
